item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: My son’s father died, but his stepmother won’t return his calls. We don’t even know if there’s a will. What now?
item.description: “My son is hurt, to say the least, that she is acting this way.”

item.title: Worried about Elon Musk and DOGE getting your Social Security number? Here’s how to protect yourself.

item.title: My friend, 62, may only have weeks to live. How does he prevent his second wife from inheriting everything?

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
